descriptionHtml:
Small description Backround: Turns the honningbrew meadery to a player home.New map marker was put in.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I redid all the room where they sleep and the room below them it.I put a table and set food up real nice.There are still three skeevers if you find where they spawn pls post it in the comments.
The quest is still Good There Is only Three skeevers Still to Kill I need to know where they spawn.
Thanks.
This From Bits And Pieces Mod Sanctuary.
Check out the site https://sites.google.com/site/bitsandpiecemodsanctuary
